title: That's a Linux moment
description:
It’s a well-known fact that Fred is a Linux enjoyer, and he’s suffered this grave affliction for years. As it is technically possible to play CS:GO on a Linux OS, every time anything remotely technical goes wrong in his world, it is most certainly down to the Linux-based OS.
The below is an intermittent error that Fred gets when launching CS:GO on his Linux PC, this is a quintessential example of a Linux Moment
